nodes.text: Chasuli was a Human female villager and member of the Myyydril tribe. She lived in the Myyydril Caverns along with the rest of her tribe, within the Kkowir Forest on the Wookiee homeworld of Kashyyyk during the Galactic Civil War in 1 ABY.

Chasuli appears in the 2005 expansion pack for Star Wars Galaxies known as Rage of the Wookiees. She was an incidental character and offered no quests to the player. Star Wars Galaxies was shut down on December 15, 2011.
